alert.note: Alert for Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 2:56PM CDT until May 21 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Newton County in east central Mississippi... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newton, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Decatur around 310 PM CDT. Stratton around 325 PM CDT. Duffee around 330 PM CDT. Little Rock around 335 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Hickory. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
